name: BFL Chat Compactifier
description: Makes Butterfly Labs' shoutbox a bit more IRC-like.
additional_info:
Just a quick hack based off of a screenshot BFL_StevenM posted. Requires you to be using the Detached view!

TODO:
Fix the "Shout to" menus not appearing. I never use these, so it's low priority until some people complain ^_^;;


v0.1.4
 - Now adjusts for windows size better.
 - Got rid of thick grey space at bottom of window.
 - Sticky Note not floats at top of the chat, with sort of yellow PostIt colour
 - Idle Notice now appears on top of input box, to prevent accidents (was too easy to send a message which was rejected by the server and erased from the input line, which would force you to type the message again).


v0.1.3
Another fix for vbshout_padding, due to misplaced semicolon

v0.1.2
Fix for vbshout_padding element sometimes not being hidden

v0.1.1 
Tighter tab spacing, so more chats and private shouts fit next to each other without scrolling

v0.1
Initial release
